## kusion version

    Print the kusion version information for the current context.

### Synopsis

Print the kusion version information for the current context.

```
kusion version [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Print the kusion version
  kusion version
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for version
  -o, --output string   Output format. Only json format is supported for now
```
